original_text: Then Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel, and Joshua the son of Jehozadak, the high priest, with all the remnant of the people, obeyed the voice of the Lord their God, and the words of Haggai the prophet, as the Lord their God had sent him. And the people feared the Lord.
korean_text: 스알디엘의 아들 스룹바벨과 여호사닥의 아들 대제사장 여호수아와 남은 모든 백성이 그들의 하나님 여호와의 목소리와 선지자 학개의 말을 들었으니 이는 그들의 하나님 여호와께서 그를 보내셨음이라 백성이 다 여호와를 경외하매

sentences.original_text: Then Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel,
and Joshua the son of Jehozadak,
with all the remnant of the people,
obeyed the voice of the Lord their God,
and the words of Haggai the prophet,
as the Lord their God had sent him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 하나님 여호와께서 그를 보내신 대로

sentences.original_text: And the people feared the Lord.
